include(ExternalProject)

SET( SUPERSEEKER_DEPENDENCIES )

include(cxxopts.cmake)
LIST(APPEND SUPERSEEKER_DEPENDENCIES ${CXXOPTS_PROJECT})

SET(SUPERSEEKER_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)

SET(SUPERSEEKER_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/externals/superseeker_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "external project directory")
SET(SUPERSEEKER_EXTERNAL_PROJECT superseeker_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "all superseeker external projects")
ExternalProject_Add(${SUPERSEEKER_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
    DEPENDS ${SUPERSEEKER_DEPENDENCIES}
    DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	SOURCE_DIR ${SUPERSEEKER_SOURCE_DIR}
	BINARY_DIR ${SUPERSEEKER_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bin
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
        -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
        -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}
)
